Articles.Content:
Heres a bunch of war vehicles I made. Mods used were... 

Quiz Tech

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/111691-WIP-1-0-2-QuizTech-Aero-Pack-v1-2-8-x-Updated-6-9-15-New-Mk2-Service-Bay-and-Small-Tanks](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/111691-WIP-1-0-2-QuizTech-Aero-Pack-v1-2-8-x-Updated-6-9-15-New-Mk2-Service-Bay-and-Small-Tanks)!!

BD Armory

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/85209-1-0-2-BDArmory-v0-8-3-(critical-fixes-improved-AI)-Dev-Thread-May-30](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/85209-1-0-2-BDArmory-v0-8-3-%28critical-fixes-improved-AI%29-Dev-Thread-May-30)

P.E.W.

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/117635-WIP-1-0-2-R1-P-E-W-%28A-BDArmory-Addon%29](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/117635-WIP-1-0-2-R1-P-E-W-%28A-BDArmory-Addon%29)

FantomWorks

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/109567-1-0-2-WIP-FantomWorks-0-3-1-KAX-Part-Pack](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/109567-1-0-2-WIP-FantomWorks-0-3-1-KAX-Part-Pack)

(If any are missing please let me know)

(Some of these aircraft don't use all of these mods, but you will need all of these if you want to use all of my aircraft)

A-10 Warthog
